description: Romeo speaking facts! I’ve heard from multiple people saying that these so called “reality” shows are all scripted and the set the scenes up for people to fight and argue. Everyone on those shows are desperate for a check and will do anything for fame and fortune. I hate shows like “Love And Hip Hop” and “Bad Girls Club”! Disgraceful! I’m just glad people are walking away from it. #hollyweirdisevil
